name: Burger Sniffer
description:
Because I don't have time to make stealth game , I just made a simple driving game without any type of violence as you guessed.

You are a bogeer the burger maniac who is trying to scavange all the burgers of the town.

Collect the burger , get score and repeat.

Controller : 

[W][S][A][D] : to move

[LEFT-Shift] : to speed up

[R] : reload scene 

[ESC] : quit
